Module com.example.inventorymanagementapplication
Package com.example.inventorymanagementapplication.controller

Class MainScreenController

java.lang.Object
com.example.inventorymanagementapplication.controller.MainScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that views the main screen after logging into the application.

    Initialize method for the MainScreenController to initialize the stage and items.

    mainScreenAddPartButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method to add a part and directs to the add part window.
    void
    mainScreenAddProductButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method to add a product and directs to the add product window.
    void
    mainScreenDeletePartButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method that deletes the part from the part's table by grabbing the part being selected by clicking on the part and ensures you can delete the part by first confirming the deletion of the part and if confirmed then the part is deleted from the table.
    void
    mainScreenDeleteProductButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method that deletes the product from the product's table by grabbing the product being selected by clicking on the product and ensures you can delete the product by first confirming the deletion of the product and if the product has parts associated with it then the product cannot be deleted, but if the product does not have parts and if confirmed then the product is deleted from the table.
    void
    mainScreenExitButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method that exits the application when the "EXIT" button is clicked.
    void
    mainScreenModifyPartButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method to modify a part by selecting a part in the part table and directs to the modify part window, but if a part is not selected then an error message pops up.
    void
    mainScreenModifyProductButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method to modify a product by selecting a product in the product's table and directs to the modify product window, but if a product is not selected then an error message pops up.
    void
    mainScreenPartKeyPressedAction(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
    Method that shows all parts in the part table when the search bar has no text.
    void
    mainScreenPartSearchAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method to search through the part search bar and add the parts to a temporaryParts ObservableList and if the part has the same ID or name as the text in the search bar and returns the parts in the list.
    void
    mainScreenProductKeyPressedAction(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
    Method that shows all products in the product table when the search bar has no text.
    void
    mainScreenProductSearchAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Method to search through the product search bar and add the product to a temporaryProducts ObservableList and if the product has the same ID or name as the text in the search bar and returns the products in the list.

    • mainScreenPartSearchAction

      public void mainScreenPartSearchAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method to search through the part search bar and add the parts to a temporaryParts ObservableList and if the part has the same ID or name as the text in the search bar and returns the parts in the list. If the part is not found then an error message pops up on the application.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • mainScreenProductSearchAction

      public void mainScreenProductSearchAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method to search through the product search bar and add the product to a temporaryProducts ObservableList and if the product has the same ID or name as the text in the search bar and returns the products in the list. If the product is not found then an error message pops up on the application.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
